div.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; position: relative

img.style: width: 70px; height: 70px; border-radius: 12px; align-self: center; left: 0px; top: 0px; position: relative

div.style: display: flex; width: 70px; height: 24px; background-image: 40008; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 16px; font-weight: bold; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; position: relative; background-size: contain; margin-top: -24px

label.style: align-self: center; font-weight: bold; margin: 1px 4px; font-size: 15.8px; color: @Color_Text_Highlight
